item.name: Old photograph
item.desc: You stare intently at the photograph, but you can't make out anything more than the colours. There's vivid {Red}red {White}and {Green}green{White}, and a kind of dull {Magenta}purplish{Blue} blue{White}.

item.name: Toy gun
item.desc: A toy gun. It's orange and grey, and looks worn from use. You remember how vividly it used to fuel your imagination, seeming almost like a real weapon in your daydreams.

item.name: Bath bomb
item.desc: A multicoloured bath bomb. You try and pick of the plastic wrapping, but you can't quite get it off.

item.name: Weird jar
item.desc: A weird jar filled with an unknown cloudy green substance. There's a faded label on it, all you can make out from it is: 'bot---d dr--m wate-'.
